title: The "Fuck Jax" Patch 8.5
body: Riot: "Oh a lot of Jax players prefer Cinderhulk in order to have a chance to team fight and not get instantly bursted by 2 auto's from a 6 item Xayah / Tristana? GO FUCK YOURSELVES, NERRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRFED."

replies.body: We get it, you're a Jax main... it's not like cinderhulk is used by many champions...

> [{quoted}](name=Maldini30,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wd1y9qaA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-07T10:56:05.957+0000)
>
> We get it, you're a Jax main... it's not like cinderhulk is used by many champions...

Cinderhulk / Aftershock was the playstyle for many Jax players who wanted to tank for their team. Riot just wants every melee champ to be a glass cannon or a tank,  in other words, Riot wants their already dog-shit game to become even more dog-shit and turn into horse shit
game is horse shit already, they are trying to reach void-monster shit now

> [{quoted}](name=Kiss Kiss Kiss,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wd1y9qaA,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2018-03-07T11:10:59.323+0000)
>
> game is horse shit already, they are trying to reach void-monster shit now

lol
Yeah, I figured that was the point of the thread also.

> [{quoted}](name=BigBonedCartman,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wd1y9qaA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-07T10:52:23.329+0000)
>
> pta got buffed ....

and Aftershock got, guess what?

Guess what?

NeRfEd haHAA what you wanted to not get bursted for stepping 2 inches towards an ADC? AHAHAHAHAHAH

We here at Riot want to let you know, 
we fucking hate you

yeah they are nerfing duskblae next patch it is a joke by riot i guess  they really lvoe adc xd
Are you actually taking Aftershock on Jax...?

See here's where your problem lies:
{{item:3078}} {{item:3146}}
What you should actually be getting is:
{{item:3025}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3193}} with the assortment of situational items {{item:3194}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3075}} etc. etc.

That there Trinity-Gunblade build is far outdated and useless unless you can end the game by 10 minutes.

what the fuck are you talking about? This is my forum account, I don't use my main account to post on the forum coz of armchair creeps like you LOL.

I was diamond for many seasons, definitely don't need your item build advice
You should get {{item:3076}} {{item:3047}} and outscale them.
Don't cry. You got counter strike, what let's you stay alive for 2 sec before getting 2 shotted from the little beloved adc.

Right through the counter strike no but really Riot loves to shove needles right through my dick
Honestly i'm quite glad that Jax is underperforming slightly, sure he has obvious weakness but the free damage he gets from his ult passive alone is just kinda ridiculous really.
